org.hornetq.api.core
Class HornetQException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          org.hornetq.api.core.HornetQException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class HornetQException
extends Exception

HornetQException is the root exception for HornetQ API.

Author:
Tim Fox
See Also:
Serialized Form
